author: Stephen Sigmund
message: Learn wisdom from the ways of a seedling. A seedling which is never hardened off through stressful situations will never become a strong productive plant.
title: Thought of the day

author: Charles R. Swindoll
message: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Camus
message: All men have a sweetness in their life. That is what helps them go on. It is towards that they turn when they feel too worn out.
title: Thought of the day

author: Frank Tyger
message: Be a good listener. Your ears will never get you in trouble.
title: Thought of the day
